modName: Lakeview Manor -  REAL Armory for North Wing
summary: Adds a Armory to the North Wing of Lakeview Manor that is a REAL armory and not a joke like the original one.
descriptionHtml:
Because the Armorys at Hearthfire Houses were such a great disappointement, I decided to make a completely new Armory for in my opinion the worst Wing at the Hearthfire Manor, the North Wing.
This ONLY works for Lakeview Manor, the other two houses stay untouched.
If you wanna have my armory just Install it with NMM or drag the File into your Data folder.
You have to do that best before building your North Wing.
The other option is to Build your Trophy room but dont fill it with furniture.
Keep it completely empty because my Mod will add all weapon Racks and Mannequins into it.
If you have already build furniture in the Trophy room it will collide with my furniture and thats something you don't want to ;D
All weapon racks and mannequins will come without weapons and armor.
In my screens I just filled them up to show you how it can maybe look like and that it works ;D
So what you wanna do to use this mod:

1. Install the Mod
2. Build your Lakeview Manor NORTH WING TROPHY ROOM (storage and alchemy room wont work)
3. Remove the Workbench from NORTH WING
4. Enjoy ;D

(Step 1 and 2 can like I said be swapped but your Trophy room has to be EMPTY)


UNINSTALL:

Simply remove all items you got in there and remove the Mod with NMM or delete the Folder

but

you will have a empty Trophy room so you cant change the North Wing to another wing type.


Misc:

I am actually using RealVision ENB and I made the screens with that ENB so if you are using any ENB take the Main Version of my Mod.
For all Non-ENB Users you should try out the Vanilla_Lights Version.
That should better match to Vanilla Skyrim Light Levels.
author: Xenosch
